item.title: Getting Started Hugo 2 of 3
item.description: Picking up from last time we have a dirt simple hugo site; applying a simple theme, now we are going to maake a couple of customisations to the template. Wild Assumptions You have a Google Analytics (GA) account; ready to go. Background Information Partial templates have a specific lookup order (see the official documentation on Partials for details); tldr Hugo will look in the ‘local’ directory first then the theme directory e.

item.title: Getting Started Hugo 1 of 3
item.description: This will be the first post in a short series about getting started with hugo. By the end of this you will have a dead simple proof of concept site which we will build on in later posts. Next in this series Getting Started Hugo 2 of 3 Static site generators such as Hugo are great for sites that donâ€™t have any particular reason for dynamic (database driven) content; or for simple sites where the ‘dynamic’ content you do have rarely changes.
